required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: ENRED@TE. Social Support in Southern Spain. Interventional Study
clinical_study.official_title: ENRED@TE. Social Support in Southern Spain. Interventional Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Maimónides Biomedical Research Institute of Córdoba

clinical_study.source: Maimónides Biomedical Research Institute of Córdoba

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective to be achieved is to find out if the perceived social support, the perceived loneliness, the perceived social isolation and the family support of those over 65 years of age improve after participating in the Enréd@te project carried out by the Spanish Red Cross (CRE).

primary_outcome.description: Duke-UNC Functional Social Support Questionnaire (Bellón et al. 1996) is an eight-item instrument to measure the strength of the person's social support network. Each item is ranged from 1 to 5 points, where high scores represent greater social support.

UCLA Loneliness Scale (Russell DW, 1996) which is a 20-item scale designed to measure one's subjective feelings of loneliness as well as feelings of social isolation. This tool use a 4-point rating scale (1= never; 4 = always). High values mean more loneliness.

secondary_outcome.measure: Detection of risk situations or social problems
secondary_outcome.description: Gijón socio-family assessment scale (García González et al. 1999) allows the detection of risk situations or social problems. Values range from 3 to 15. Higher values mean more severe social decline.

intervention.description: Information and awareness activities; activities for the acquisition of skills; activities that help the elderly to attend spaces for leisure, participation and maintenance and/or improvement of their personal relationships.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- People over 65 years
- Not institutionalised
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants of other programs
- Difficulty responding to measurement scales due to language barriers
- Legal incapacitation
- People with a residence of less than 3 months in the city

facility.name: Maimónides Biomedical Research Institute of Córdoba
